name: Path of Explosion
description:
Hello adventurer! Welcome to Project Jupyter.

You are required to help a very dangerous world, fighting a lot of monsters until you are capable of fighting the demon lord. You will be reborn there as a Crimson Demon. Thus your ability will only be EXPLOSION. But before that, we will train you here.

This is a sandbox world where adventurers like you can train and level up as much as you can. Yes you read it right. There is no limit for your level!

So what are you waiting for? Beef yourself up and prepare for the dangerous adventure that is waiting for you!
